data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J. (2013): Onycocaris maui sp. nov., a new pontoniine sponge associate (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae) from the Hawai’ian Islands. Zootaxa 3691 (3): 377-388, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.3.6
